sections.heading: of property of debtor; reference
sections.text: The judge may in his discretion order a reference to a referee agreed upon or appointed by him, to report the evidence of the facts.SourceR.S.1867, Code § 545, p. 489;R.S.1913, § 8124;C.S.1922, § 9060;C.S.1929, § 20-1578;R.S.1943, § 25-1576.
